title: Future Versus Event Matchups and Ideas?

replies.body: I just want to say that I _loved_ how for the length of this year's event, the boards morphed a huge debate over the _nature of good and evil._ Definitely food for thought on any future events.

> [{quoted}](name=Zoli Ben,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=06lWQrdQ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-09-04T12:24:35.938+0000)
>
> {{champion:50}} vs {{champion:39}} is bigger in new lore than vs {{champion:59}}

With Irelia though, it's another one of those cases where Swain is clearly the villain to Irelia's hero. Even though the war made her become an Ionian extremist, she's not in an equal position to him like Jarvan is. Plus, Demacia's strict laws and society can definitely raise some parallel questions to Noxus's society under Swain, as shown with Garen and Darius.

However, since Garen and Darius were just done this year, I'd imagine it would be quite a few years before they'd consider giving Swain and Jarvan the event.
